Questions.question: Is the receipt date, expense type and country of purchase correct?

possibleanswers.comment: The date of the receipt,  and the country/ location of purchase, do not match the details of the receipt provided.   Please correct these discrepancies and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

The date of the receipt and the expense type claimed do not match the details of the receipt provided.   Please correct these discrepancies and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
The date of the receipt does not match the date of the expense claim. Please correct the date discrepancy and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
The expense type claimed does not match the receipt details. Please choose the correct expense type and resubmit the report. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

The country/location of purchase selected does not agree to the receipt provided to support the claim. Please amend the Country of purchase and resubmit this claim. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

possibleanswers.displayText: Date and Expense Type and Country are incorrect
possibleanswers.comment: The date of the receipt,  the expense type claimed and the country location of purchase, do not match the details of the receipt provided.   Please correct these discrepancies and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

possibleanswers.displayText: Expense Type & Country of purchase incorrect
possibleanswers.comment: The expense type claimed and the country /location of purchase, do not match the details of the receipt provided.   Please correct these discrepancies and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
A supporting receipt/invoice has not been provided. Please provide a receipt for this expense or correct the receipt status selected for claim. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
The receipt is not legible. Please provide a more legible copy of this receipt and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
Un-receipted expenses require a comment. Enter an explanatory comment and resubmit.

The  receipt does not cover / show the amount claimed on the report. Please correct amount and resubmit, or provide additional receipts to cover the claim value. If an element of the claim is un-receipted please submit this element separately, selecting 'No receipt'.%expensetype% , %expenseamount%,  %expensedate%

The amount of the receipt does not cover the amount claimed on the report. Please correct amount and resubmit, or provide additional receipts to cover the claim value. If an element of the claim is un-receipted please submit this element separately, selecting 'No receipt'. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

Questions.question: Does the Receipt show the supplier name, supplier Address and a description of the goods & services purchased?

possibleanswers.comment: The receipt is not legible. Please provide a more legible copy of this receipt and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount% on %expensedate%

Questions.question: Is the Customer Name, Customer Address and a receipt ref/invoice number shown of the receipt?

possibleanswers.comment: The receipt is not legible. Please provide a more legible copy of this receipt and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

The receipt currency does not match the currency of the expense claimed. Please correct the currency or provide the correct receipt.  If the correct receipt is lost please correct the receipt status to 'No receipt'. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

Questions.question: Has the correct hire duration been selected?

possibleanswers.comment: The hire duration selection does not agree to the hire information provided on the receipt.  Please correct the hire duration and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

Questions.question: Has the correct fuel receipt been selected?

possibleanswers.comment: The fuel receipt you have provided does not agree to the car fuel type. Please either provide the correct fuel type receipt to support this claim or change the receipt status to 'No Receipt'. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

A supporting receipt/invoice has not been provided. Please provide a receipt for this expense or correct the receipt status selected for claim. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
The receipt is not legible. Please provide a more legible copy of this receipt and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
Un-receipted expenses require a comment. Enter an explanatory comment and resubmit.

The  receipt does not cover / show the amount claimed on the report. Please correct amount and resubmit, or provide additional receipts to cover the claim value. If an element of the claim is un-receipted please submit this element separately, selecting 'No receipt'.%expensetype% , %expenseamount%,  %expensedate%

The amount of the receipt does not cover the amount claimed on the report. Please correct amount and resubmit, or provide additional receipts to cover the claim value. If an element of the claim is un-receipted please submit this element separately, selecting 'No receipt'. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%

Questions.question: Does the Receipt show the supplier name, supplier Address and a description of the goods & services purchased?

possibleanswers.comment: The receipt is not legible. Please provide a more legible copy of this receipt and resubmit. %expensetype% for %expenseamount% on %expensedate%

The receipt currency does not match the currency of the expense claimed. Please correct the currency or provide the correct receipt.  If the correct receipt is lost please correct the receipt status to 'No receipt'. %expensetype% for %expenseamount%, %expensedate%
